title: Extra security for climate minister after threats
promo_sum: Canada's Catherine McKenna says she has been the target of increasing abuse and threats.

title: Storm Dorian cuts power to thousands in Canada
promo_sum: The diminished hurricane battered Nova Scotia with winds of 100mph; cutting power to 450;000 homes.

title: Trump faces third challenger in Republican race

title: Andreescu stuns Williams to win US Open
promo_sum: Teenager Bianca Andreescu stuns Serena Williams in a gripping US Open final to claim a first Grand Slam title and deny the American a 24th major.

title: MIT Media Lab head resigns over Epstein donations
promo_sum: Joichi Ito's move comes after claims that MIT tried to conceal gifts from the disgraced financier.
